definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

pinyin: Zhong1 hua2 Quan2 guo2 Zong3 gong1 hui4

definition: Hong Kong Federation of Trade Unions
pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Gong1 hui4 Lian2 he2 hui4

sentences.english: The lawyer has been appointed to mediate between the employers and the union leaders.
sentences.chinese: 這位律師被指定在僱主和工會領導人之間進行調解。

sentences.english: Union was a tool used by the capitalists in their vain attempt to damp down the labour movement.
sentences.chinese: 那個黃色工會是資本家妄圖用來撲滅工人運動的工具。

sentences.english: Employee Union Management System for Shanghai Jiefang Daily Newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 上海解放日報工會管理系統。

sentences.english: That's for mechanical harvesting-the grape growers'way of beating the unions.
sentences.chinese: 這是爲了便於機械收割，是葡萄園主對付工會的辦法。

sentences.english: My name is Silas. I am an Opus Dei numerary.
sentences.chinese: 我叫塞拉斯，是天主事工會的成員。“”

sentences.english: The result of occupational disease checkup should be announced to trade union.
sentences.chinese: 並及時向工會通報職業病檢查情況。

sentences.english: Management are seeking a show-down with the unions on the issue of illegal strikes.
sentences.chinese: 資方正在就非法罷工問題與工會攤牌。

sentences.english: But private investors may have been durably scared by the union's display of clout.
sentences.chinese: 但是私人投資者受到工會的這政治上的強烈恐嚇。

sentences.english: China's trade unions could be transformed by the law.
sentences.chinese: 中國的工會職責在新法裏有很大變化。

sentences.english: The party was established to represent the interests of workers and trade unionists.
sentences.chinese: 工黨的成立宗旨是代表工人階級和行業工會的利益。

sentences.english: The union is oriented towards welfare capitalism.
sentences.chinese: 工會以福利資本主義爲其奮鬥目標。

sentences.english: The Thieves Guild maintains a network of fences that allow the player to sell their stolen goods.
sentences.chinese: 盜賊工會有一個可以賣掉贓物的銷售網。

sentences.english: Yesterday, the City Federation of Trade Unions held in sympathy with the Urban Management Committee of the sanitation workers activities.
sentences.chinese: 昨日，市總工會與市城管委舉行慰問環衛工人活動。

sentences.english: The union has balloted its members in pursuit of a pay claim.
sentences.chinese: 爲了要求加薪，工會讓其成員進行無記名投票表決。

sentences.english: She used to be a thief here, until she decided to move down south to the Boneyard.
sentences.chinese: 她過去是我們工會的成員，後來她決定南下去曬骨場。

sentences.english: Street protests and union-led strikes have fizzled out.
sentences.chinese: 街頭抗議和工會組織的罷工已經失敗了。
